body: These low-cut shoes of polished red leather feature golden eyelets and stitching in a fiery pattern. They grant the wearer fire resistance 10 and allow the wearer to walk atop lava and magma as if subject to the water walk spell.
name: Shoes of the Firewalker
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Feet/Feet Slot Wondrous Items/Shoes of the Firewalker
